    pruningSample.Rd

    pruningSample(
  gds,
  method = "corr",
  sampleCurrent,
  study.id,
  listSNP = NULL,
  slide.max.bp.v = 5e+05,
  ld.threshold.v = sqrt(0.1),
  np = 1,
  verbose.v = FALSE,
  chr = NULL,
  minAF.SuperPop = NULL,
  keepGDSpruned = TRUE,
  PATHSAMPLEGDS = NULL,
  keepFile = FALSE,
  PATHPRUNED = ".",
  outPref = "pruned"
)

    Arguments

    gds

    an object of class gds opened

    method

    a character string representing the method used in SNPRelate::snpgdsLDpruning() function. Default: "corr".

    sampleCurrent

    A character string corresponding to the sample.id use in LDpruning

    study.id

    A string corresponding to the study use in LDpruning

    listSNP

    the list of snp.id keep. TODO. Default: NULL.

    slide.max.bp.v

    a single numeric TODO. Default: 5e5.

    ld.threshold.v

    a single numeric TODO. Default: sqrt(0.1).

    np

    TODO. Default: 1.

    verbose.v

    TODO. Default: FALSE.

    chr

    TODO. Default: NULL.

    minAF.SuperPop

    TODO. Default: NULL.

    keepGDSpruned

    a boolean TODO. Default: TRUE.

    PATHSAMPLEGDS

    TODO

    keepFile

    a boolean indicating if the file must be TODO. Default: FALSE.

    PATHPRUNED

    a character string TODO. Default: ".".

    outPref

    TODO. Default: "pruned".

    Value

    The function returns 0L when successful.

    Author

    Pascal Belleau, Astrid Deschênes and Alexander Krasnitz

    Examples

    
## Path to the demo pedigree file is located in this package
data.dir <- system.file("extdata", package="RAIDS")
